name: Extreme Viral Contamination
desc: An artificial military virus has claimed $market. Without focusing most, if not all their efforts on costly and time-consuming decontamination procedures, the population is doomed to succumb to the merciless infection. From now on, $market is beyond any hope and salvation.

name: Centralised manufacturing
desc: With the mining and production facilities tightly interwoven into a single planetary-wide system, it becomes possible to considerably improve the quality of the output.

name: Orbital Mining Lazor
